options.name: lock
options.description: Lock your voice channel to new members.

options.name: users
options.description: Mentions of users you would like to allow in the channel.

options.name: unlock
options.description: Unlock your voice channel to new members.

options.name: streamlock
options.description: Restrict voice for new members of your channel.

options.name: users
options.description: Mentions of users you want to allow to speak/stream in the channel.

options.name: refresh
options.description: Check that there are voice channels to join, and create a channel if not.
